Model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.InteractiveObject
      • Model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends InteractiveObject
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is initiated in the constructor of GameLogic and is responsible of keeping track of all player related stats. It implements the serialized interface so that the state can be saved permanently on a local file. The class can interact with Enemy and Item objects.
    Version:
    2015-03-05
    Author:
    Henrik Numé
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int level,
              int attack,
              int maxHp,
              int hp,
              java.lang.String name,
              int exp)
        Constructor that will create a new Player object with the given values as start values.
        Parameters:
        level - The level of the player
        attack - The attack of the player
        maxHp - The max health of the player
        hp - The health of the player
        name - The name of the player
        exp - The experience of the player

    • Method Detail

      • getExp

        public int getExp()
        Getter for the players experience
        Returns:
        The players experience as an int.

      • setExp

        public void setExp(int value)
        Setter for the player experience
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for exp.

      • addExp

        public void addExp(int change)
        Adder for player experience. exp over 100 leads to level up, which will give the player a bonus to the stats.
        Parameters:
        change - The value of change is added to the existing exp.

      • healToFull

        public void healToFull()
        Sets the player's hp to its maxHp

      • getPlayerNr

        public int getPlayerNr()
        Getter for the player's identifying number which is parsed from the playername.
        Returns:
        The player's number as an int.

      • updateStats

        public void updateStats(Item item)
        Adds values from an item object to the player's fields.
        Parameters:
        item - The item that has been picked up.

      • exchangeHitsWithEnemy

        public void exchangeHitsWithEnemy(Tile nextTile)
        The player will deal one hit to the enemy. If enemy is still alive it will deal one hit to the player. Stats for both player and enemy will be updated.
        Parameters:
        nextTile - This tile should contain the enemy
